title: Long-term YouTube Video Editor
job_overview:
I am looking for a hardworking video editor that can create videos with an extremely quick turnaround and can edit cuts that are simple but effective. Video standard for quality of effectiveness attached here: Upgrade to see actual info/file/d/1cykcliZE5elwfDXWvw_xkNFPSBX6lTud/view?usp=sharing

It is preferred if you are able to be online during U.S. hours. Prior experience editing for YouTube channels is highly preferred, as well as access to fast and consistent WiFi.

You will receive a rate of $1/min for video editing in the style I attached. Please do not apply if you are not ok with this wage. 

Include the word "chair" in your proposal to show you have read all the details. You must provide your editing portfolio or you will not be considered.
